chapters.title: Chapter 18: A Taste of Solitude
chapters.info: Lord Barthanes Damodred, p. 295 (409)—High Seat of House Damodred, the most powerful house in Cairhien besides House Riatin, the former king's house. He was a Darkfriend, and died the last time Rand was in Cairhien. His estate is now used as Rand's library. His sign is a charging boar. See also Damodred, Caraline; Damodred, Laman.
